    public class KickstartEditCommand
extends BaseKickstartCommand

      • setIsOrgDefault

        public void setIsOrgDefault(java.lang.Boolean defaultIn)
        Update the isOrgDefault field for this KickstartData. If set to true this will update any existing KickstartData records for this Org that have their isOrgDefault set to true. There can be only *ONE* KickstartData with isOrgDefault set.
        Parameters:
        defaultIn - to update this profile to

      • setComments

        public void setComments(java.lang.String commentsIn)
        Parameters:
        commentsIn - to set for Kickstart

      • updateKickstartableTree

        public ValidatorError updateKickstartableTree(java.lang.Long channelId,
                                     java.lang.Long orgId,
                                     java.lang.Long treeId,
                                     java.lang.String url)
        Take in the set of required information to determine what kickstartable tree to use for this Kickstart profile.
        Parameters:
        channelId - id of ChannelFamily selected.
        orgId - org id
        treeId - kickstart tree id
        url - the url of the channel.
        Returns:
        ValidatorError if we couldn't find a KickstartableTree to update to

      • updateChildChannels

        Parameters:
        childchannelIds - as strings
